1.10.2.3.0.4.726:
Fixed four bugs.
More config options.
1.10.2.3.1.0.807:
Add GUI to tea pan and barrel.
Change the way to make pu'er tea leaf.
Remove pu'er tea leaf block.
Adjust the textures about black tea leaf.
Adjust the growing function and models of tea plants.
Add paddy field block and adjust the way to grow rice crops.
Remove "Water Hoe".
Eat food made of rice can replenish more hunger value.
Fixed three bugs.

1.12.2.3.0.4.726:
Fixed two bugs.
More config options.
1.12.2.3.0.4.726.1: Fixed the bug that the message is wrong when the washed rice isn't enough.
1.12.2.3.2.0.807:
Add GUI to tea pan and barrel.
Change the way to make pu'er tea leaf.
Remove pu'er tea leaf block.
Adjust the textures about black tea leaf.
Adjust the growing function and models of tea plants.
Add paddy field block and adjust the way to grow rice crops.
Remove "Water Hoe".
Tea table uses new algorithm.
The data structure of zisha kettle is adjusted, so if you upgrade this mod from the old version, the block may be missing.
Improve the ore dictionary compatibility.
Eat food made of rice can replenish more hunger value.
Fixed three bugs.
1.12.2.3.2.3.930:
Fixed bugs (include the bug that can't work on the server when Guide-API is installed).
Add more options about rice cooking.
Add new way to open up paddy field.
